survey_name: Public Library Digital Resource Usage Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand how patrons use digital resources provided by public libraries and identify areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How often do you use the digital resources provided by your public library (e.g., e-books, audiobooks, online databases)?
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button for single-choice selection. Ensure the scale is clear and options are mutually exclusive.

script.question_text: How often do you use the digital resources provided by your public library (e.g., e-books, audiobooks, online databases)?

questions.question_text: Which of the following digital resources do you use? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', 'Monthly', or 'A few times a year' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-choice selection. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional input.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE) with optional open-text for 'Other'

script.question_text: Which of the following digital resources do you use? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', 'Monthly', or 'A few times a year' in Q1

questions.question_text: What challenges do you face when using the library's digital resources?
questions.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', 'Monthly', or 'A few times a year' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use an open-text field to capture detailed feedback. Keep the question neutral and non-leading.

script.question_text: What challenges do you face when using the library's digital resources?
script.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', 'Monthly', or 'A few times a year' in Q1

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the variety of digital resources available?
questions.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', 'Monthly', or 'A few times a year' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for single-choice selection. Ensure the scale is balanced and clearly labeled.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the variety of digital resources available?
script.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', 'Monthly', or 'A few times a year' in Q1

questions.question_text: What additional digital resources would you like your library to offer?
questions.client_notes: Use an open-text field to encourage creative suggestions. Make the field optional to reduce respondent burden.

script.question_text: What additional digital resources would you like your library to offer?
